name.title: Procedure name
name.description: The name of the procedure is more specific than `procurementMethod`.

hasAcceleratedProcedure.title: Accelerated procedure used
hasAcceleratedProcedure.description: Whether or not the delay for tenderers to bid is shorter than the usual legal delay.

acceleratedProcedureRationale.title: Accelerated procedure rationale
acceleratedProcedureRationale.description: The rationale for choosing to proceed with an accelerated procedure.
